short.ar: اتبع رموز QR بسهولة على سطح المكتب الخاص بك دون مغادرة المتصفح
short.am,bg,ca,cs,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_4: Easily follow QR Codes on your desktop without leaving your browser.
short.bn: আপনার ব্রাউজার ছাড়াই আপনার ডেস্কটপে QR কোডগুলি সহজেই অনুসরণ করুন৷.
short.da: Følg nemt QR-koder på dit skrivebord uden at forlade din browser
short.de: Folgen Sie QR-Codes ganz einfach auf Ihrem Desktop, ohne Ihren Browser zu verlassen.
short.es: Siga fácilmente los códigos QR en su escritorio sin salir del navegador.
short.fa: به راحتی کدهای QR را روی دسکتاپ خود بدون ترک مرورگر خود دنبال کنید.
short.fi: Seuraa QR-koodeja helposti työpöydälläsi poistumatta selaimesta.
short.fil: Madaling sundin ang Mga QR Code sa iyong desktop nang hindi umaalis sa iyong browser
short.fr: Suivez les codes QR sur votre bureau sans quitter votre navigateur.
short.hi: अपना ब्राउज़र छोड़े बिना अपने डेस्कटॉप पर आसानी से QR कोड का पालन करें.
short.hu: Könnyen követheti a QR-kódokat az asztalon anélkül, hogy elhagyná a böngészőt.
short.id: Ikuti Kode QR dengan mudah di desktop Anda tanpa meninggalkan browser Anda.
short.it: Segui facilmente i codici QR sul tuo desktop senza uscire dal browser.
short.ja: ブラウザを離れることなく、デスクトップ上の QR コードを簡単にたどることができます
short.ko: 브라우저를 종료하지 않고도 데스크탑에서 QR 코드를 쉽게 따라갈 수 있습니다.
short.nl: Volg eenvoudig QR-codes op uw bureaublad zonder uw browser te verlaten.
short.no: Følg enkelt QR-koder på skrivebordet ditt uten å forlate nettleseren.
short.pl: Z łatwością śledź kody QR na pulpicie, bez opuszczania przeglądarki.
short.pt_BR: Siga facilmente os códigos QR em seu desktop sem sair do navegador.
short.ro: Urmați cu ușurință codurile QR de pe desktop fără a părăsi browserul
short.ru: Легко следуйте QR-кодам на рабочем столе, не выходя из браузера..
short.ta: உங்கள் உலாவியை விட்டு வெளியேறாமல் உங்கள் டெஸ்க்டாப்பில் QR குறியீடுகளை எளிதாகப் பின்தொடரவும்
short.te: మీ బ్రౌజర్‌ను వదలకుండా మీ డెస్క్‌టాప్‌లో QR కోడ్‌లను సులభంగా అనుసరించండి
short.th: ติดตามรหัส QR บนเดสก์ท็อปของคุณได้อย่างง่ายดายโดยไม่ต้องออกจากเบราว์เซอร.
short.tr: Tarayıcınızdan ayrılmadan QR Kodlarını masaüstünüzden kolayca takip edin.
short.uk: Легко слідкуйте за QR-кодами на робочому столі, не виходячи з браузера.
short.vi: Dễ dàng theo dõi Mã QR trên máy tính để bàn của bạn mà không cần rời khỏi trình duyệt.
short.zh_CN: 无需离开浏览器即可轻松关注桌面上的二维码。
short.zh_TW: 無需離開瀏覽器即可輕鬆關注桌面上的二維碼

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
QR Go lets you follow QR codes from your web browser! QR Go is FREE and does not require extra permissions 😊

With just 2 clicks you can follow any QR code you find on the web.  OR  Pin the extension to your taskbar and with just 1 click you can follow QR codes. It doesn’t get any easier than this!😄

QR Go RESPECTS YOUR PRIVACY!

We do NOT collect your data. We do NOT sell your data. We don’t even track web store installs. Basically, Ben has no idea who you are unless you send an email and say hello. 

No login is required either. Why on this good Earth would someone make you login to be able to follow a QR code in your browser?

Install QR Go from the Chrome Web Store today! And if it helps you make the most of your web browsing, please consider leaving a review in the chrome web store to spread the word. 

QR Go is made by Happy Concepts (Ben Bird). You are most welcome to donate a few dollars to the creator of this extension, but there is no obligation at all.

Now ... GO! GO FIND SOME QR CODES ON THE WEB! 😊😊😲


- LEGAL NOTICES - 

QR Go is Copyright 2024 Ben Bird. All Rights Reserved
QR Go was Made in the U.S.A. with love
